sn35.26:1.1: “Sabbam, bhikkhave, anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.2: Kinca, bhikkhave, anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya?
sn35.26:1.3: Cakkhum, bhikkhave, anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.4: Rupe anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.5: Cakkhuvinnanam anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.6: Cakkhusamphassam anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.7: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya …pe…
sn35.26:1.8: jivham anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.12: yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.14: manam anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.18: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:1.19: Idam kho, bhikkhave, sabbam anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.1: Sabbanca kho, bhikkhave, abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.2: Kinca, bhikkhave, sabbam abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya?
sn35.26:2.3: Cakkhum, bhikkhave, abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.4: Rupe abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.5: Cakkhuvinnanam abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.6: Cakkhusamphassam abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.7: Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya …pe…
sn35.26:2.8: jivham abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.12: yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.14: manam abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.18: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.26:2.19: Idam kho, bhikkhave, sabbam abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya”ti.
